Settings - Class in dontlookback
Game Configuration Settings Centralized configuration class that manages all game settings including: - Display resolution and graphics options - Gameplay mechanics (monster spawning, difficulty) - Debug and development modes - User interface preferences This class follows the singleton pattern for global settings access and provides both runtime configuration and build-time options.
Settings() - Constructor for class dontlookback.Settings
Initialize settings with default values Configures the game for development/testing mode by default

Don't Look Back - Horror Survival Game Engine
